title: Pressure cooker boeuf bourguignon
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1.5kg stewing steak, cut into cubes', '2 large onions, chopped', '4 large carrots, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 parsnips, sliced', 'salt and freshly ground pepper', '2 glasses of red wine', '1 bay leaf', '5 sprigs of parsley', '500ml cold water', '1 beef stock cube (optional)', '1 rounded tablespoon cornflour']
